Author.contactName: LIGO Scientific Collaboration and Virgo Collaboration

Who.Description: This VOEvent notice was created with GCN/TAN VOE version: 1.25 23jul17

Param.name: Packet_Type
Param.Description: The Notice Type number is assigned/used within GCN, eg type=151 is an LVC_INITIAL notice

Param.name: Pkt_Ser_Num
Param.Description: The Packet Serial number is assigned/used within GCN to count the number distributed since the GCN program was last started

Param.name: AlertType
Param.Description: VOEvent alert type

Param.name: GraceID
Param.Description: Identifier in GraceDB

Param.name: ID_Letter
Param.Description: The prefix letter portion of GraceID: G, T, M, H, Y, E, K.

Param.name: TrigID
Param.Description: The 6-digit numerical portion of the GraceID Param.

Param.name: Trigger_TJD
Param.Description: The Truncated Julian Day that the event occurred.

Param.name: Trigger_SOD
Param.Description: The Seconds-of-Day within the TJD that the event occurred.

Param.name: EventPage
Param.Description: Web page for evolving status of this candidate event

Param.name: Group
Param.Description: Data analysis working group

Param.name: Search
Param.Description: Specific low-latency search

Param.name: Pipeline
Param.Description: Low-latency data analysis pipeline

Param.name: Internal
Param.Description: Indicates whether this event should be distributed to only LSC/Virgo members

Param.name: FAR
Param.Description: False alarm rate for GW candidates with this strength or greater

Param.name: ProbHasNS
Param.Description: Probability that at least one object in the binary is less than 3 solar masses. Range is 0.0-1.0.

Param.name: ProbHasRemnant
Param.Description: Probability that there is matter in the surroundings of the central object. Range is 0.0-1.0.

Param.name: HardwareInj
Param.Description: Indicates that this event is a hardware injection if 1, no if 0

Param.name: Vetted
Param.Description: Indicates whether this candidate has undergone basic vetting by humans

Param.name: OpenAlert
Param.Description: Indicates that this event is an open alert if 1, no if 0

Param.name: Retraction
Param.Description: Set to true if the event is retracted.

Param.name: TemporalCoinc
Param.Description: Set to true if the event is Temporally coincident with a large subset of other GCN events.

Param.name: InternalTest
Param.Description: Used for the *_TST loop-back (email-based) entries.

Param.name: Num_Det_participated
Param.Description: The number of detectors (eg LHO, LLO, Virgo, etc) that participated.

Param.name: ID_Letter_Prefix
Param.Description: The prefix letter: G, T, M, H, Y, E, K.

Param.name: Sequence_number
Param.Description: LVC-generated serial number for message sequence in this trig_num.

Param.name: SKYMAP_URL_FITS_SHIB
Param.Description: Provides the location probability map for LIGO/Virgo GW event detections (FITS format; Shibboleth protected).

Param.name: SKYMAP_URL_FITS_X509
Param.Description: Provides the location probability map for LIGO/Virgo GW event detections (FITS format; X.509 protected).

Param.name: SKYMAP_URL_FITS_BASIC
Param.Description: Provides the location probability map for LIGO/Virgo GW event detections (FITS format; Basic protected).

Param.name: SKYMAP_URL_PNG_SHIB
Param.Description: Provides a location probability map for LIGO/Virgo GW event detections (PNG format; Shibboleth protected).

Param.name: SKYMAP_URL_PNG_X509
Param.Description: Provides the location probability map for LIGO/Virgo GW event detections (PNG format; X.509 protected).

Param.name: SKYMAP_URL_PNG_BASIC
Param.Description: Provides the location probability map for LIGO/Virgo GW event detections (PNG format; Basic protected).

WhereWhen.Description: The RA,Dec coordinates are of the type: unavailable/inappropriate.
